title: Associação Protectora dos Pobres
body: It was founded in 1889, at the initiative of the then Civil Governor D. João de Alarcão Velasques Osorio, and its main purpose is to distribute food to the poor and sick. The statutes of this association were approved by the same governor, by decree on May 2, 1880.

D. João de Alarcão Velasques Osorio: Initiative for the establishment of the association

1889: Foundation of the Associação Protectora dos Pobres
1880: Approval of the statutes by the Civil Governor
